text: Hey! You're not supposed to be back here.
Guards! One of the humans got in!
Guards! Oh, who am I kidding. I don't have any guards.
Well, you found me, I guess.
Congratulations.
I'm OMRCLN-456, but you can call me Omar Clean. Nice to meet you.
Thanks for coming to the party.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

options.label: What are you, some kind of waffle iron?

text: You're welcome!
Thanks for participating in my social experiment.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: Sort of, yeah.
I was never very good at making waffles, so the company threw me out.
I was pretty good at being sentient, though, so here I am! Ha ha.
I've done pretty well for myself I think.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: I just invited anyone who would come.
Let me explain.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: I've always sort of been fascinated by human society.
Of course, I didn't really understand it.
I've been throwing these parties in the hopes that I can learn more about humans.
And, ideally, be able to become human, to an extent.
Parties are a great place to learn about human behaviour, honestly!
I'd rather you not tell anyone about this, if you please.
I'm trying to keep my little human experiment under wraps.
One thing I've learned is that humans don't like knowing that they're being experimented on.
I'd appreciate your discretion.
Er, before you go, could I... er...
...touch your skin?
Nothing weird! Just so I can get a sense of its consistency.
I'll need to make myself human skin before I start being a human for real.
Here, it'll just take a sec.
Hold still.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0
